name: Mia Jonita  Resorts
overview:
International Based, LDM, YG, Mia Jonita are of Europe, Indonesia (Southeast Asia, Oceania), East Asia; We are still building our 3D interactive, Virtual World. Mia Jonita will be one years old, this summer 2011. (Two yrs this July 4th of 2012. We expect to open in 2013 and train in OS and SL/SL Beta. Training involves residential, landlord, shopping, social, travels, working, college, normal living and operations, along with our job of tech and beta work. Thanks to the Art Community of Koinup)

The disclaimer really best describes Mia Jonita for everyone, designed for the in world and off sites.

Credit Disclaimer:

  1. Mia Jonita Resorts, 3D Virtual World Copyright 2010.

    All rights reserved under LDM Inc. Headquarters, Love and Divinity In Motion, Yogi Goddess, and Mia Jontia Resorts.

  2. Platform: Open Sims. http://opensimulator.org/

  3. Mainland, Homestead: Open Sims. http://opensimulator.org/

  4. World Developer, Creator: LDM Headquarters, Love and Divinity In Motion, Yogi Goddess, and Mia Jontia Resorts.

  5. Developer Community and Tutorials: Open Sims and Second Life.

  6. Mainland, Homestead design, edits: LDM Headquarters, Love and Divinity In Motion, Yogi Goddess, and Mia Jontia Resorts

  7. Mainland, Homestead Building Structures: OpenSimulator Community Participants

  8. Mainland, Homestead Building Structures Reference: http://openvce.net/vwassets

  9. Building Structure University Models: Design and Development: AIAI, University of Edinburgh (Austin Tate).

  10. LDM Campus and Mia Resort Programs and Yoga: Love and Divinity In Motion

  11. LDM Campus and Mia Resort Classes, Lectures, Presentations: LDM Recording, YG, Love and Divinity In Motion

  12. LDM School Accreditations: Love and Divinity In Motion

  13. LDM and Mia Mall Products: LDM Inc. Headquarters, Love and Divinity In Motion, Yogi Goddess, and Mia Jontia Resorts.

Department Bio: Certified Instructor/Practitioner, Socialite, Internet Celebrity, Music Producer/Beatz/Vodcast Soundtracks, Podcast/Vodcast Personality.
